mapper.sql: PKID, RISK_CONTROL_ID, MORTGAGE_CATEGORY, MORTGAGE_CODE, MORTGAGE_NAME, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_BY
mapper.select: SELECT mortgageInfo.MORTGAGE_CATEGORY, mortgageInfo.MORTGAGE_NAME FROM sctrans.T_RC_RISK_CONTROL riskControl INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_RC_MORTGAGE_INFO mortgageInfo ON riskControl.PKID = mortgageInfo.RISK_CONTROL_ID WHERE riskControl.RISK_TYPE = #{riskType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND riskControl.ELOAN_CODE = #{eloanCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into sctrans.T_TO_RC_MORTGAGE_INFO
PKID,
RISK_CONTROL_ID,
MORTGAGE_CATEGORY,
MORTGAGE_CODE,
MORTGAGE_NAME,
CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_BY,
#{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{riskControlId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{mortgageCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{mortgageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{mortgageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
@{SESSION_USER_ID}, GETDATE(), GETDATE(), @{SESSION_USER_ID},
mapper.update:
update sctrans.T_TO_RC_MORTGAGE_INFO
RISK_CONTROL_ID = #{riskControlId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
MORTGAGE_CATEGORY = #{mortgageCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MORTGAGE_CODE = #{mortgageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MORTGAGE_NAME = #{mortgageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sctrans.T_TO_RC_MORTGAGE_INFO set RISK_CONTROL_ID = #{riskControlId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, MORTGAGE_CATEGORY = #{mortgageCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MORTGAGE_CODE = #{mortgageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MORTGAGE_NAME = #{mortgageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
